Recipe.Description: Fluffy crumbly biscuits perfect for Biscuits and Gravy.

Prerequisites.Prerequisite: Prepare oven with rack just below center and preheat to 425F.
Grease an 8 inch square or 9 inch round baking pan.

Ingredient.Name: Self rising flour
Ingredient.Notes: Low protein preferred like, Lily White.

Method.Step: Add flour and salt to a mixing bowl.
Cut 4 tbps of butter into the flour, until no lumps larger than a pea remain.
Add butter milk and 2/3 cup of heavy cream. Stir mixture until it resembles cottage cheese, adding more heavy cream, if needed.
Put AP flour in another bowl.

Scoop portions of dough into the AP flour and shape the dough into a ball before placing them into the greased pan.
The biscuits should be touching and fill the pan,
Bake for 20-25 minutes until biscuits are golden brown.
Brush the tops of the biscuits with the remaining butter, melted.
